channel.title: Need help! Please and Thanks :]
channel.description:
Hello everyone i am new to coding and coding RSPS at that lol
Been recently fixing things up on a PI source I found.
I am looking for a way so i can block single players from trading.
I couldn't find a forum or link anywhere giving a TUT how.
I'd appreciate it thanks :]

item.title: Need help! Please and Thanks :]
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“owner_ryan, post:5, topic:410163”]Thanks bro i’ll look for that!

+rep

and mind if i um pm you if i can’t find?[/quote]Yeah sure. I’ll walk you through it if I have to.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! Please and Thanks :]
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“owner_ryan, post:3, topic:410163”]It’s not for that reason.
It is for like umm say someone donated to spawn… i don’t want them trading with others… dropping items and or losing items when dying.

That’s why i need to know how.

Sorry i guess i didn’t make the first post clear enough

But thanks for the info :][/quote]
Under the action packet for trading add something like

if(player.hasDonated){ return; }
before all the other trading methods are called.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! Please and Thanks :]

It’s not for that reason.
It is for like umm say someone donated to spawn… i don’t want them trading with others… dropping items and or losing items when dying.

That’s why i need to know how.

Sorry i guess i didn’t make the first post clear enough

But thanks for the info :]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help! Please and Thanks :]
item.dc:creator: @Xx_Weed_Xx Xx Weed Xx
item.description:
@Xx_Weed_Xx wrote:

Just stop multi log in it’s a lot easier, going into config.java

Find; public static final int IPS_ALLOWED = x;

Replace X with 1.

Read full topic
